content: shiloh-One Year_1년 회상해 보게 하는 곡오늘 DJ존노의추천곡은 shiloh의 One Year이다.이 가수에 대한 설명은... 찾아보기 힘들다...​여러 곳을 돌다 겨우 찾아낸 것은 SOUNDCLOUDOne Year담담하게 자신의 1년을 읊조리며 부르는 느낌의 노래이다.Been about one year,and I might just tell you how i feelIm not.. so sureI can, I Open my mouth way too much,But I can’t right now,I got too much going on in my head,I feel safe with you,But I think that I might hate the truth,and Maybe im losing my mind,This is so picture perfect ,Losing on the inside,Seeing on the surface,Give me a sec just to breatheYou can tell that I’m happy cause im singing,Maybe this time imma wing it,Getting kinda loud ears ringing, ....piece it togetherI feel it, All the way up to my ceiling,Where in my fan just spins all day,Twenty times I’ve ripped my pride apart,Twenty times I’ve denied my heart,Maybe its time, maybe its time,I did something dangerous, oh​Been about one year, andI might just tell you how i feelIm not... so sure I can,I Open my mouth way too much,But I can’t right now,I got too much going on in my headI feel safe with you,But I think that I might hate the truth,and Maybe im losing my mind,This is so picture perfect ,Losing on the inside,Seeing on the surface,Give me a sec just to breathe.Just know that you’ve been on my mind,I know im not wasting my time,I know that you’re feeling the same way,So won’t you give me a sign?The kids have been losing their mind,I’ve just been taking my time,When it comes to breaking my bones,And breaking my heart, I cant decide!Twenty times I’ve ripped my pride apart,Twenty times I’ve denied my heart,Maybe its time, maybe its time,I did something dangerous, oh​Sucha waste to be alone,But I just smashed my phoneThis anxiety that’s inside of meFeels like a knife and I don’t know where to go,Sometimes I wish ‘ could do it all overTake it back to the days that I wasn’t older,But we all grow up, all grow up, one day​But you don’t get that till its over,Train wrecking my head,And Im feeling like woah,Photograph on the 4th thinkin bout you,And it’s kinda crazy that this is amazing,I don’t really get that so often,Stuck up on my head like a coffin,I guess I had it,But I guess that I’ve lost it,Sometimes I feel like a problem,I hope you can solve it.Been about one year,and I might just tell you how i feelIm not so sure I can,Open my mouth way too much,But I can’t right now,I got too much going on in my head,I feel safe with you,But I think that I might hate the truth,and Maybe im losing my mind,This is so picture perfect ,Losing on the inside, Seeing on the surface,Give me a sec just to breathe, It’ll work..I... just don’t wanna screw it up, You know?​팬카페에서 밝혀낸 분의 말씀에 의하면...뉴욕 예심 날이 1월 6일~~~그 때 세상 힙한 복장으로 나타났었는데 ㅋㅋ그 때부터 1년으로 어제 팬텀3 갈라콘서트 방송까지...이 때만 해도 이렇게 1년을 보내게 될 거라곤 상상하지 못했을 것 같다.​그 때 만약 예심을 보지 않았더라면...😱😱😱😱예심 봐줘서 고마워요~~~​나의 블로그도 1년간 지나보니... 1년동안 700개 넘는 글이 쌓였는데 그 중에5.23일날 팬텀싱어3 와이리좋노~ 존노에 빠지다라는 글로 처음 존노에 관한 글을 쓰기 시작했다.이 글은 2000명이 넘는 사람이 읽었고...이 글을 5000명이 넘는 사람이 읽었었네...​그냥 나의 생각을 올렸는데 사람들이 많이 읽어서 한편으론 부끄럽기도...이 때만 해도 내가 이렇게 공연까지 보러가게 될 줄 상상도 못했는데....​처음으로 팬카페도 가입하고 활동하고... 그 안에서 웃고 울다보니 어느덧... 시간이 훌쩍...2020년도는 나에게 쉬어가는 해였는데,,, 잘 쉴 수 있었음에 감사하다.​2021년은 다시 일을 해야하는 관계로이제는 자주 소식을 올릴 수 없고,감상평도 자주 남기지 못할 수도 있으며,공연장은 더더욱 가기 힘들어질.... ㅠ.ㅠ (제발 주말에 많이 열어주시길...)​무엇보다 매일 올리던 존노의 추천곡도 올릴 수 없을 가능성이 높다.글이 뜸하더라도... 응원하는 마음은 같다는 걸 잊지 말아주시길 바라며~~~​​​​​​​​
